review: Bought for Hulu app, does not work.
author: aimee m lalande

review: Only have had it for a few days but we LOVE IT! So many cool features and we can play Sling TV through it, which was the main reason we bought it!
author: Jacquelyn

review: It's amazing! I love being able to  plisten to my praise and worship music on pandora whenever I choose to.
author: Chelsee Orton

review: This was given as a gift to my grand daughter, she has been thrilled with this gift
author: popcorn1936

review: I LOVE THIS!!!!!  I have cable TV with the most basic, standard 6 channel package so I lack access to all the TV shows on HBO etc.  With the fire stick,  I have been able to watch television shows I would have never had access to unless I paid top dollar!  I have watched countless movies, viewed my photos from my Kindle Fire, caught up on old television shows I loved!  I have the Prime membership for $99 a year and this is definitely priceless!
author: mugshmell

review: Easy set up.  All the apps I need to cut the cord with cable!
author: Moe

review: Perfect for bedroom. I run Kodi on all my FireTV boxes, however the stick does not play x265 very well.
author: Jonathan H.
